class_notes:
(Topic: Seminar in Pedagogy and Professionalization)
The course prepares students for teaching a literature section in the fall or spring of their fifth year. Students will gain experience in preparing documents for fellowship applications and the job market, such as cover letters, curriculum vitae, teaching, diversity statements, writing samples, and interpretations of job and postdoctoral ads. The seminar will also investigate careers beyond academia, in coordination with the LGS Asst. Dean for Prof. Dev and Career Planning, allied Ph.D. pgms, the Alumni Office, the CFD, and another relevant programming.
